column5: As of 11:45 ...400 southbound closed at King City Side road for a jack knifed tractor trailer.  ...15 cars involved as well by the sounds of it.  Guess daughters going to be doing the dog run down #11

I just picked up my little one from SK, and we just walked in the door and our 13 year old calls and asks if we can pick her up because they just closed the school   , noone could have told us that when we where just there   ..wife's work also closed for the day too...it's piling up for sure

I stayed home today...the commute in would have been fine, but I'm in no mood to battle the afternoon rush hour.  Within a half hour of the snow flying, the roads were completely covered here!  Be safe everyone!
it's already  -21 here and -32 with the wind, i think i'm gonna have to use the hunting blind on the lake today!
I'll keep an eye out for your report..... good luck to ya Going fishing tomorrow morning..... going to be chilly to say the least
the gear is in the truck and its warmin up as i type hope to have a few pics for ya as well gonna have to be self takes my buddies think its too cold after yesterday!!!
Ended up turning around. Got to hwy 9,went to use Weston,pile up there,Bathurst the same.
Not a flake here. It's about time it went south of us for a change.  Stay safe everyone!
Don't tell me these things Brian... I told me daughter to use #11.. she wanted to use the 400 to 89.. then over to 11. Guess we'll find out.....
Well I made it home (after shopping of course   ) and shovelled the driveway and now one hour later it doesn't look like I shovelled at all  Joey

Sorry bud,didnt mean to alarm ya. The roads are to be better Saturday. Thankfully. Thats when I get to say my good byes..    On a side note,for all you truckers that carp about us,well some of you guys are BRUTEL drivers yerselves. Buddy was coming up in the fast lane snow covered and weaving,causing white outs. Real nice and professional.

WINTER Poem  It's winter in Canada And the gentle breezes blow Seventy miles an hour At thirty-five below.  Oh, how I love Canada When the snow's up to your butt You take a breath of winter And your nose gets frozen shut.  Yes, the weather here is wonderful So I guess I'll hang around I could never leave Canada Cuz I'm frozen to the ground!
She had absolutely no issues getting to downtown TO Brian.. other than finding the DVP closed. What's up with your driving? LOL
Freezing rain, sleet, most of the schools are closed and driving is headed downhill, don`t know if it`s headed your way.
I am driving to Orlando on Saturday evening.  Hopefully things are cleaned up by then.

Don`t know which way you go down there Cudz, another storm is supposed to be hitting east of here, my daughter is supposed to be flying in Saturday evening from Rhode Island and is worried about airport closings and delays.
I just looked at the weather and it looks pretty nasty for the upper midwest and northeast, heavy snow and ice. Looks like a good day for a hot cup of coffee and some hook sharpening!

Ha, they're calling for more snow south of me for once...they say it could get nasty for the evening commute home, so those in Toronto and on that line, do yourselves a favour and leave at lunch time  Me, I'll be sitting by the wood stove with a good book and a nice cup of tea.  for all those driving and travelling, be safe, take your time and arrive alive  Maureen
The word is this storm is suppost to hit the toronto area by 9 this morning...hmmm last day of school, snow storm coming...ya im staying home today

Well its in full force here in Chatham at 6am the roof on my carport was clean by 6:20 it was totally covered with snow and its not letting up it will be a long day here I am glad I am off work for teh holidays Be safe to anyone who needs to drive if not STAY HOME
Thank god i work nites and i'm off till sunday nite. I guess i'll be sharpening some hooks and getting all my ice fishing gear ready.

around here, it totally goofed up plans I had for almost a week to get out trout fishin in the boat  ..good thing I went fishin on Tuesday or I would be totally bummed becasue the day we had the musky G2G..2 of my friends out in 2 boats had days of about 20/boat..and then the wind and weather turned a bit around here and the river has been spent for a couple days.  for everyone who has to commute today anywhere, take your time and be safe
Just started to snow here in Ajax, Ontario and the wind is really picking up down by the lake. I am on the shores of Lake Onario.
In Gatineau, we were suppose to get hit big time but now calling for 10cm's of snow and temps going down to below -20C..... Right now temp @ -16C with windshield -22C from the NE... Brrrrrrr Leechman
the snow is flying in full force here in hamilton. they are calling for up to 20 cms today and more to come over the next few days
Thank God i'm off until boxing day.....i'm looking out the window and in about 5 minutes i lost my drive way....be safe guys
Just started coming down seriously up here in Bobcaygeon...better give myself a shake and drive into town before it gets too heavy...
snowing pretty good here in bradford  guess I will not go fishing on cooks bay today
Not going to be a nice drive to the city today thats for sure. Everyone drive safe and just stay out of my way.
i think a lot of people stayed home today in the big smoke.  drive in was quicker than normal, even with the adverse conditions.  ohh yeah, outta my way too.
Ya, the commute was fantastic today Raf  If there's nobody on the roads when I go home I can do some pretty gnarly maneuvers  Joey
400 south is closed at Aurora rd. due to several accidents near King Rd.  401 looks pretty bad too...  Drive safe everyone...  Maureen
Good to hear the chickens stayed home Raf/Joey... daughter #1 is on her way to the big smoke shortly. Vis isn't great even here in the yard.
I am off till the new year and chicken to go anywhere so I sit here watching all the threads disappear or get locked

yeah, wayne.  it looks like many people who have no business being out there today, aren't.  if only that were the case more often. hope the 400 is smooth sailing for your daughter.  have a fun & safe drive home joey.  they are letting us go early.. may have to find an empty lot somewhere for some 'fun'.
Oh she has to go out Raf... she has a party to get to ! lol ! She'll have it locked up in 4 wheel and is well versed in winter driving..... living in the snow belt's buckle here and all !
just watch out theres supposed to another storm on sunday and tuesday
Ya, just found out us too.  Safe drive Raf!!  Joey
